audioText: Ce bébé au ventre nu dormiras véritablement paisiblement
question: What will happen to the baby?
options: The baby will sleep truly peacefully
The baby will cry loudly soon
The baby will wake up immediately
The baby will eat something healthy
explanation: The correct answer is 'The baby will sleep truly peacefully'. The text states 'Ce bébé au ventre nu dormiras véritablement paisiblement' - This baby with the bare belly will truly sleep peacefully. This uses the future tense 'dormiras' and the adverb 'véritablement' (truly).
